passives.name: Phreakish Gusto
passives.effects: {{tip|Turret}} basic attacks are modified to deal {{as|70% of this minion's '''maximum''' health}} as {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}}.

passives.name: Minion Damager
passives.effects: Against lane minions, this minion deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} on-hit equal to {{as|4% of the target's '''current''' health}}.

effects_structured.raw: {{tip Turret}} basic attacks are modified to deal {{as 70% of this minion's '''maximum''' health}} as {{tt pre-mitigation damage Damage calculated before modifiers}}.
Against lane minions, this minion deals {{as '''bonus''' physical damage}} on-hit equal to {{as 4% of the target's '''current''' health}}.
